title: Is it worth it to get an iPhone 6s Plus in 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 6s runs the current iOS, and will almost certainly get at least one more upgrade, and possibly no update(IOS 13). It will run most current apps (minus a few games and things that rely on newer features like AR). It’s a thin, light, quick little phone with a great camera. It has TouchID and will work with ApplePay. If you have an older phone or no iPhone at all, it’s worth it.

It is an IPhone and there is no doubt about it’s quality but you must appreciate that it is almost 4 years old smartphone from Apple.Moreover,it is priced at around 34000 to 40000 rupees range in India. In this price range you can get a wonderful phone like one plus 6 T which is blazing fast,latest software,very good camera and in screen fingerprint sensor.There are other options too.I think it is not worth it at this price.
